title: Flipping Numbers PT 1
description: GOOD2GO PUBLISHING PRESENTSTHE HIGHLY ANTICIPATED DEBUT NOVEL FROM ERNEST MORRIS EJ is a normal guy living a normal life, that is until he meets Maria a woman that changes his life forever. Maria teaches him how to make fast money by just flipping a few numbers. EJ quickly goes from a regular joe to a man of power. But he's forced to learn the hard way that with more money comes more problems and with more problem EJ is forced to keep flipping numbers.Step into EJ's world where money rules and one bad flip can end your life.
author: Ernest Morris
